description: This file contains test cases for the Notes App frontend component, testing rendering, adding notes, and searching functionality.

methods.name: test('renders Notes App header')
methods.description: Checks if the 'Notes App' header is rendered correctly.

methods.name: test('can add and save a new note')
methods.description: Tests the process of adding a new note with title and body and saving it.

methods.name: test('can search notes by title')
methods.description: Verifies that searching by title displays the correct note.
